nodes.title: chore(ModuleManager): refactor and document engine module setup
chore: consume TeraNUI v3 release
build(Jenkinsfile): improve pipeline performance; add docstrings
chore(rendering): remove usage of GL_ARB_framebuffer and reworked shadowmap and lightpass
fix: world generation with zones
fix: lightgeometrypass to allow shadows to be disabled
feature(ecs-gestalt): Migrate Components to gestalt's Components.
doc: update minimal system requirements for OpenGL 3.3
feature: migrate RegionOutlineRenderer and allow support to specify AllocationType
chore: replace getAllSides with values()
style: address checkstyle findings
chore: fix PackageDeclarationCheck findings
chore(rendering): migrate use of ARB bind framebuffer EXT and reworked readBackPixels
chore: upgrade to gestalt 7.1.0 from snapshot
chore: reusue Floatbuffer for uniform
chore: remove check for Opengl33
build: update TeraConfig to 1.6.3 and adjust IntelliJ settings
chore: cleanup migrate shaders into CoreRendering
fix(rendering): remove unsupported ARB for opengl 2.0
bugfix(rendering): rework glsl for osx
chore: move SideBitFlags into Side
chore: minor cleanup for ChunkProcessingPipeline
chore: cache hashcode for uniform id
feat: order chunks on demand
Test shearing system
refactor(bootstrap): remove duplicate registerComponents method
chore: remove DynamicPriorityBlockingQueue
feat: allow character teleport event to set rotation
fix(audio): skip update when player is invalid
perf: replace stream with for loop  when retrieving facets.
style: fix checkstyle findings
feat: expose scale for BrownianNoise
refactor(rendering): rework chunk mesh generation with RXJava
refactor: convert Jenkinsfile to declarative pipeline syntax
chore(rendering): migrate chunk mesh generation Flux
fix: use link to new Jenkins in readme
Revert "chore: remove finite check from LocalPlayer"
chore: empty default implementation for RenderSystem interface
fix(ci): backslash-escape multi-line shell command
fix: failing publish stage
chore: minor cleanup Block
perf: improve performance of mesh generator for chunks
chore: remove finite check from LocalPlayer
test: provide a subsystem to register the unittest module
fix: make BlockArea.iterator() use the same order as noise and facet data
refactor: replace usage of ThreadManagerSubsystem with reactor Scheduler
chore(persistence): replace transaction manager with Reactor
feat(noise): Add domain rotation to mitigate Perlin squareness
refactor: rework unloading logic for chunkprovider
chore: remove url check when updating repositories
feature: add gooey CLI
test: mockito inline for modules
test: make parts of PathManagerProvider public for use by MTE
build(IntelliJ): update annotation paths and other configurations
refactor(GameState): extract common code from MainMenu and HeadlessSetup
build: avoid transitive dependency on org.reflections
feat(ModuleManager): do not depend on PathManager to load modules from the classpath
perf: avoid calling GLFW.glfwGetWindowSize
chore(rendering): cleanup and remove deprecated glDisabled
fix: resolve problems with gui editor
chore: remove unecessary cast
feat: allow for ranged item activation
perf: upgrade with proto3 and reworked network packets
perf(network): replace de-/inflate with lz4 for both directions
perf: remove extra length prepend
feat: rework chunk ordering using Reactor
feat: add `SetDirection` event to set player orientation
fix: collide with characters instead of walking through
perf: remove extra locking in pipeline to avoid thread contention
fix: replicate mesh and material over network
fix: flip first two verticies for double sided meshes
feat: restore biome-based grass and foliage tinting
fix: resolve issue when loading a world a second time
test: deprecate WorldProvidingHeadlessEnvironment
feat: add priority to Updates annotation of facet providers
perf: rework with proto3 reworked packing network packets split net messages
refactor(GameScheduler): provide ThreadMonitor-compatible schedule method
fix: resolve Advance World Settings issue
fix: Better handling of ComponentSystem loading with optional dependencies
chore: adjust default logback configuration
feat: hide NotificationOverlay (chat box) if HUD is hidden
chore: add maven repo that contains jpastebin
fix(build): use Maps from guava, not Google API Client
test: have IntelliJ ask if tests should be run by itself or gradle
fix: enable block tinting in LOD chunks
feat: add `./gw completion` command.
feat: add random distribution utilities from AnotherWorld
feat: Add parallel module get
refactor: change bullet physics implement into component system
feat: implement progress monitor for monitor jgit command execution.
feat: add debug bounding box rendering
feat: add commands for visual debugging (bounding boxes, etc.)
feat: make render distance for (partially) transparent blocks adjustable
build(facade): oops, junit was supposed to be a test-only dependency
bugfix: PojoPrefab was getting seriliazed as a value type
bugfix: fix debug for skeleton renderer
chore: stop ignoring checkstyle findings
feat(reactor): make separate graphic scheduler/thread
chore: remove SubmersibleCamera abstraction
chore: address some checkstyle warnings
